verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: ratcheted] up [ARG1: the Trump administration 's rhetoric against Iran] and gave warm boosts of support to Israel .
[ARG0: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] ratcheted up the Trump administration 's rhetoric against Iran and [V: gave] [ARG1: warm boosts of support] [ARG2: to Israel] .
